Text: AirTran Airways announces our newest destinationHere at AirTran Airways we are busy preparing to enter our th destination Rochester New York New service will begin on March with daily roundtrip flights between Rochester and BaltimoreWashington International Airport BWI as well as daily roundtrip flights between Rochester and our hub in Atlanta To help celebrate our new service to Rochester we are offering special introductory fares as low as oneway between Rochester and BWI and as low as oneway between Rochester and Atlanta The introductory fares must be purchased by January and travel must be completed by June See below for examples of more introductory fares Whats even better than introductory fares for travel to and from Rochester airport How about getting a discount for buying your ticket at wwwairtrancom Thats right Buy your introductory fare at wwwairtrancom and receive a BONUS discount Remember Travel may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and dont require roundtrip purchase Sample Fares for travel between Rochester NY and Atlanta BaltimoreWashington DC BWI DallasFort Worth Fort Lauderdale GulfportBiloxi Houston Hobby Jacksonville Memphis Myrtle Beach Orlando Tampa Remember Travel on the above fares may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and dont require roundtrip purchase And if you purchase your introductory fare at wwwairtrancom youll receive a BONUS discount Other rules and restrictions All fares are oneway All fares are nonrefundable and a per person fee applies to any change made after purchase plus any applicable increase in airfare Service tofrom Rochester NY begins on March Travel must be complete by June Fares must be purchased by January The following blackout dates apply March and April and May Seats are limited and subject to availability Fares dont include segment taxes of up to per segment A segment is defined as a takeoff and landing Airport passenger facility charges of up to are not included And now for the best deals on earth You know that youll always get a great deal on airfare from AirTran Airways but did you know that AirTran Airways has partnered with the Hertz Corporation to give you special low rates on Hertz car rentals To get these great rates click on the Hertz icon after you have completed your AirTran Airways booking You will be transferred to the Hertz website and the AirTran Airways discount will be automatically applied AirTran Airways and Hertz making travel affordable Youve got a great airfare from AirTran Airways Now complete your travel package with a low rate from the Hilton Family of Hotels Just click on the following link and check out Hilton Family Value Rates at most AirTran Airways destinations wwwhiltoncomspecialsvaluesmainhtml As a subscriber to AirTran Airways Net Escapes we send you regular updates on our Internet specials If you need to contact us for any other reason please call us at AIRTRAN or in Atlanta call Please note that any reference to Net Escapes fares Feature City fares or bonus discounts for booking online may ONLY be purchased on our web site Please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Or To unsubscribe mailto or if the emailaddress is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
